alert.note: Alert for Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ontonagon County through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockland, or 13 miles south of Ontonagon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rockland and Mass City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
